divs: Sighting Detailssaw a white glowing object fly to me and over my house. it changed its color, to a green on the bottom. very bright. I felt like I knew it personally. and was happy to see it.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Doraville
There were no other sightings in Doraville on or around June 26th 2013
Summary: saw a very white object,, changed its bottom to green. moved fast
